main event: On May 30, 1964, personnel in Antarctica observed an object believed to be an Apollo spacecraft.
interesting points: The object was not clearly visible,The object was not thought to be a meteor,The sighting generated discussions regarding its possibility being a balloon or aircraft,There was a conversation with Sgt. Moody about Apollo's orbital mechanics,Some personnel speculated it could be Echo II based on Navy's similar reports.
sighted object: an object believed to be an Apollo spacecraft
witness description: personnel at a local ground facility
